definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, originating from English and French linguistic roots, often associated with individuals or families bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作姓氏，源自英语和法语语言背景，常用于指代拥有此姓氏的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Haines presented her research on climate change at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 海恩斯博士在国际会议上展示了她关于气候变化的研究。
